game.name: Macaber Zealot
game.shortDescription: Taniharazo, who lost his memory, wakes up from the forest and goes deep into an isolated school, working with eight girls with different characteristics. ​The girls are happy together, but as one of them disappears, the serial murders gradually unfold ​But is the purpose just to find the murderer?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Taniharazo, who lost his memory, wakes up from the forest and goes deep into an isolated school, working with eight girls with different characteristics. ​The girls are happy together, but as one of them disappears, the serial murders gradually unfold ​But is the purpose just to find the murderer?
